title: cryptographic binding
extract: Definition(s): Associating two or more related elements of information using cryptographic techniques. ... Cryptographic binding works by determining the hash value of each object attribute associated with a specific object and digitally signing the collection of hashed values.
extract_html: Definition(s): Associating two or more related elements of information using cryptographic techniques. ... Cryptographic binding works by determining the hash value of each object attribute associated with a specific object and digitally signing the collection of hashed values.
